settings.editor: A web hosting service is a type of Internet hosting service that allows individuals and organizations to make their website accessible via the World Wide Web. Web hosts are companies that provide space on a server owned or leased for use by clients, as well as providing Internet connectivity, typically in a data center.

settings.error_message: There's something wrong... Please fill in the required fields.
settings.invalid_message: There's something wrong... The form is invalid.

settings.editor: Please note: The form above right requires Elementor Pro. You can, of course, use any other free contact form plugins like Contact form 7 or WPForms.

settings.title: Here's what you get for only $29 / mo

settings.editor: Our incremental backup system allows us to take snapshots of each website as regularly as every one hour and keep it for a period of 60 days. Users can download a backup or revert to a previous state at any point.
If one server is down or under DDoS attack, there is always another one to take its place, and if a website needs more resources MagicPress will automatically allocate them.

An array of caching servers is used to cache static files. This means that if a caching server does not contain a resource, it will try to find it on another caching server before attempting to request it from the web server.
Each website is isolated from others on the same server. There is no way for a compromised website to jeopardise another or for a vulnerability to propagate and access other websites’ files.
We scan each file on a daily basis and in the case malware is detected we inform the respective user by email. To avoid disruption of service we do not delete infected files automatically.
Users can get direct access to their files via FTP and the database entries via phpMyAdmin, see and modify the DNS entries, view logs. SSH access is also available in multiple site hosting plans.

settings.title: Don't Take Our Word For It

settings.editor: If one server is down or under DDoS attack, there is always another one to take its place, and if a website needs more resources MagicPress will automatically allocate them.

settings.title: Finally, a cloud service that makes sense
